Detailed Description

Member Function Documentation

def background_generator.background_generator.callback (   self,
  data 
)

Callback function for the image subscriber.

It adds the received image to the average image and outputs the background image once self.n images have been added.

Parameters:
datais the iamge data from the image subscriber.
